items.name: Shifting Sands of the Sahara
items.short_description: Experience the majestic beauty of the vast Sahara Desert, with its ever-changing dunes and stunning horizons that offer breathtaking photographic opportunities. A truly immersive natural wonder.

items.name: The Iron Ore Train Passage
items.short_description: Witness the legendary Iron Ore Train, one of the longest and heaviest trains in the world, as it cuts through the desert landscape. A powerful symbol of Mauritanian industry and a truly unique spectacle.
items.location_hint: Viewpoints along the train track, outside town

items.name: Zouérat Mining Heritage Site
items.short_description: Explore the remnants of Zouérat's early mining operations, including the original administrative buildings and machinery that tell the story of the town's foundation and its iron ore legacy. A glimpse into industrial history.
items.location_hint: Old mining district, eastern part of Zouérat

items.name: The Vibrant Zouérat Souk
items.short_description: Immerse yourself in the bustling atmosphere of Zouérat's local market, where vendors offer everything from traditional Mauritanian crafts and textiles to local produce. A sensory feast and cultural experience.
items.location_hint: Downtown Zouérat, near the central mosque
